title: Simulation-Based Learning Program for Strengthening Labor Union Field Practice Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic labor union operational procedures
context.additional_context: Process for improving on-site labor union problem-solving skills among general citizens aged 40+. Develops practical capabilities to address complex labor issues through VR-based simulations recreating actual workplace environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more labor-management conflict cases occurring in VR simulation environments and develop negotiation strategies.
Learners can simulate decision-making processes within labor unions using digital platforms and apply legal procedures with 80% accuracy.
Learners can develop five practical strategies connecting existing practices with modern labor issues through field-based learning activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
